title: Retrieve food buffs affecting a character?

comments.author: SlippyCheeze.5483
comments.body: The API doesn’t give (or have access to) real-time information like that.

comments.author: lolage.1450
comments.body: I had a look through the API2 wiki and couldn’t find anything on retrieving the current food/utility buffs affecting a character; I was wondering if I’ve just missed it or if this is a planned thing for the future?
